mapper.select: SELECT mi.*, jp.*, pi.* FROM jung_product jp INNER JOIN mem_info mi ON jp.mem_idx = mi.mem_idx INNER JOIN product_image pi ON jp.product_idx = pi.product_idx WHERE jp.mem_idx = #{mem_idx} ORDER BY jp.product_date DESC;

SELECT mi.*, ai.*, pi.* FROM auction_item ai INNER JOIN mem_info mi ON ai.mem_idx = mi.mem_idx INNER JOIN product_image pi ON ai.auction_idx = pi.product_idx WHERE ai.mem_idx = #{mem_idx} ORDER BY ai.auction_date DESC;
